title: EP#28 - Shave And A Haircut (Guest Starring Sara Paxton)
itunes:title: EP#28 - Shave And A Haircut (Guest Starring Sara Paxton)
description:
An antique store guards a mysterious record with a sinister secret. Guest Starring Sara Paxton. Also featuring the voice talents of Bruce Abels (Narrator) and Stephen Knowles (Antique Dealer) **Join our official Patreon and support the show! Get ad-free episodes, shout-outs, and more. Click the link to join https://www.patreon.com/bleedersdiegest To haunt us on social media click here https://linktr.ee/bleedersdiegest



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
